subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Matt Foy scored for the first time in more than two years, and Aaron Voros and Brent Burns added goals for the second time in two games as the host Wild beat the Colorado Avalanche, 4-1.
snippet: Matt Foy scored for the first time in more than two years, and Aaron Voros and Brent Burns added goals for the second time in two games as the host Wild beat the Colorado Avalanche, 4-1.
